availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Morgan County, Ohio, plasterer. Virginia native. Married to Mary Linkin. Father of William T. Linkin, Sarah F. Linkin, Harriett E. Linkin, Robert W. Linkin, and Mary Linkin. Plasterer in Morgan County in 1850. Plasterer in McConnelsville in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, Morgan, p. 240A.
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Morgan County, McConnelsville, p. 300.
